scenes.action_text: DAY OF THE DEAD (The original script) by George A. Romero FADE IN: 1 EXT. THE EMPTY STREET OF A CITY - DAY No people. A FEW CARS AND TRUCKS are parked at odd angles, abandoned. A TITLE FADES IN, one phrase at a time. FIVE YEARS... SINCE THE DEAD FIRST WALKED. 2 EXT. THE CITY - DAY We hear THE SOUND OF A STRONG WIND. DEBRIS flutters through the streets. A LARGE ALLIGATOR slithers into frame, stops and looks around. MONTAGE: as MORE GATO
